comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Annual Report, Volume 5, Part 1916. Connecticut. Public Utilities Commission books.google.com/books?id=5i0tAQAAMAAJ&pg=PA125&l... indicates that an accident occurred on 2/22/1916 at Milford, CT. Eleven people were killed.

comment._content: See report in The sun., February 23, 1916, Image 1
